attributes.action: Scotland to Veto Referendum vote to leave EU
attributes.background: Please add your support to encourage Scotland ministers to Veto the Brexit result. It is too small a margin for too big a decision.

rejection.details:
The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:


http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
